info.title: My First Experience with the Dangers of Documentation

preface.simpara: In my world, we don’t have to worry about mutant, script-injecting warlocks. No. We have something far worse. We’re plagued by Wolpertingers.

chapter.title: Origins
chapter.simpara: You may not be familiar with these ravenous beasts, but, trust me, they’ll eat your shorts and suck the loops from your code.
